wikipedia_page.main: Sir Richard John Pearson Aikens PC (born 28 August 1948) is a retired British judge, who was a Lord Justice of Appeal from 2008 to 2015.

link_mentions.page: List of current members of the British Privy Council

response: Verdirame was a support of Brexit, co-authoring a proposal with Sir Richard Aikens and Professor George Yarrow for Britain to remain in the European Economic Area.

Notable former members include Lord Sumption, Lord Alexander, Lord Phillips of Worth Matravers, Sir Richard Aikens, Lord Lloyd Jones, Sir Peregrine Simon, Sir Christopher Clarke, Lord Lyell, Sir Paul Walker, Sir Andrew Popplewell, Lord Leggatt and Sir Gerald Barling.
* Sir Richard Aikens, Lord Justice of Appeal
